basics.name: Jung Kim (James)
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software Enginner with a demonstrated history of working in the internet industry. My specialties include, but are not limited to: full-stack development, global ecommerce, localization and client-developer training/support.

works.summary: Deliver enterprise-grade web experiences with speed-to-market in mind.
highlights: Delivered trial/purchase ecommerce experience for the GoToResolve product line.
Delivered complete UI overhaul of GoToAssist Marketing pages.
Integrated global ecommerce trial/purchase funtionality for GoToAssist product line.

works.summary: Provide clients with technical support, training and consultation. Provide full-stack development expertise to deliver enterprise-grade web experience.
highlights: Developed RESTful API suite for facilitating document-to-site publishing workflow.
Platform migration of GoTo product websites from Adobe AEM to Brightspot CMS.
Delivered Custom Live Blogging plugin utilized in Brightspot CMS.
Delivered in platform migration of the website from GeoCities to Brightspot CMS.

works.company: L-3 National Security Solutions (Acquired by CACI)
highlights: Drafted enterprise architecture policies and procedures.
Captured and delivered analysis and whitepapers.
Engaged with government stakeholders. Provide status updates and retrospectives.
Drafted proposal for DARPA Cyber Grand Challenge / Autonomous Network Defense.
Designed, developed and maintained continuous monitoring remediation dashboards.
Created / optimized stored procedures through SQL Server Management Studio.
